subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Red Sox saw their lead over the Yankees in the American League East cut to a game and a half when the host Toronto Blue Jays finished a sweep last night with a 6-1 victory against Boston. The Red Sox have lost four in a row and five of six.
